name: Robot Dash
description:
the game is call Robot Dash is kind of a racing, click robot game. this is a school project that I have been working on for the past three weeks. you got a race track a robot as a player and houses or apartments o make the map. there is two levels once you pass the first one you can go to the next one.

to move: it moves forward bit it self the only keys you have is your mouse and the space bar. to move right you need the LEFT CLICK, to move left you need the RIGHT CLICK. and the SPACE bar is to jump.

GitHub repos:https://github.com/rosvany02/FINALS
